reasoning: Intracranial sinus thrombophlebitis (inflammation with thrombosis) incidence estimated ~0.5-1 per 100k from literature on IVST. Often secondary to infection (mastoiditis, otitis, meningitis). Uses incidence metric for acute thrombotic event.
source: Ferro JM et al. (2004). Cerebral venous sinus thrombosis: a retrospective study of 139 cases. Stroke. 35(3):664-670
